name: 4×12 — ~6 min per exercise
overview_and_execution: Simple hypertrophy approach: do 4 sets of 12 reps with the same weight, rest ~60-90s. Increase weight once all sets are completed successfully.
example_application: Shoulder Press 4×12 @ 60 lb, next session 65 lb if you can do all 4 sets of 12.
important_notes: Higher rep range fosters muscle endurance and hypertrophy. Good for accessory lifts or moderate-intensity days.
